sourcesContent:
import {React, useState, useEffect} from "react" import './Profile.css' import '../Main.css' import Header from "../Header/Header" import { SortComponent } from "./SortComponent" import { ListComponent } from "./ListComponent" import { TabsComponent } from "./TabsComponent" import { HistoryComponent } from "./HistoryComponent" import { CommentsComponent } from "./CommentsComponent" import { OverviewsComponent } from "./OverviewsComponent" import { TitlesComponent } from "./TitlesComponent" import { SearchComponent } from "./SearchComponent" import { PersonalComponent } from "./PersonalComponent" import { useAuthContext } from "../../providers/AuthProvider" export const Profile = () => { const {user} = useAuthContext() const tabs = [, , , ] const tabsname = ['Списки для чтения', 'Комментарии', 'История просмотров', "Отзывы"] const titleslists = ['Все', 'Читаю', 'Брошено', "Прочитано", "Любимое"] const sortTypes = ['По названию', "По просмотрам", "По оценкам", 'По статусу'] const sortOrders = ['По возрастанию', "По убыванию"] const [tabname, setTabname] = useState('Списки для чтения') const [list, setList] = useState("Все") const [search, setSearch] = useState('') const [sorttype, setSortType] = useState('По названию') const [order, setOrder] = useState('По убыванию') const [tab, setTab] = useState(TitlesComponent) return(
{user.nickname}
{tabname === 'Списки для чтения' && ( )} {tab}
) }
